sourcesContent:
// src/api.js
const API_BASE_URL = "http://localhost:4000/api"; // your backend URL

export const endpoints = {
  register: `${API_BASE_URL}/auth/register`,
  login: `${API_BASE_URL}/auth/login`,
  verifyFace: `${API_BASE_URL}/faceLog/verify`,
  createExam: `${API_BASE_URL}/admin/create-exam`,
  getExams: `${API_BASE_URL}/exam/all`,
  getExamById: (id) => `${API_BASE_URL}/exam/${id}`,
  submitExam: `${API_BASE_URL}/exam/submit`,
  studentResults: `${API_BASE_URL}/exam/results`,
  adminStudents: `${API_BASE_URL}/admin/students`,
  adminLogs: `${API_BASE_URL}/admin/logs`,
};
